mapper.select: SELECT e.id AS id, s.name AS brand, s.seller_icon AS brand_icon, c.id AS coupon_no, c.name AS coupon_name, c.sale_per, c.grade_no, e.event_time, IF(ce.event_no IS NULL, 0, 1) AS is_read FROM event e JOIN coupon c ON e.coupon_no = c.id LEFT JOIN seller s ON c.seller_no = s.id LEFT JOIN cus_event ce ON e.id = ce.event_no AND ce.cus_no = #{cus_no} WHERE c.grade_no = #{grade_no} AND e.is_del = 0 ORDER BY e.event_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cus_event (cus_no, event_no, read_time) VALUES (#{cus_no}, #{event_no}, NOW())
